facebook.title: Dietary pattern and depressive symptoms in middle age
facebook.summary:
"Processed food is a risk factor for depression, where as whole food is protective."

There are at least 3 things I do instinctively when things get tough; the first is to monitor more strictly what I am eating, focusing on natural, whole and unprocessed.
